title: Executive Order 10430-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Beth Campbell Short to the Competitive Position Without Regard to the Civil Service Rules and Regulations
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (22 Stat. 403, 404), it is hereby ordered that Mrs. Beth Campbell Short may be appointed to a permanent competitive position in the classified civil service of the United States without regard to the competitive provisions of the Civil Service Rules and Regulations.
citation: Harry S Truman, Executive Order 10430-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Beth Campbell Short to the Competitive Position Without Regard to the Civil Service Rules and Regulations Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/278881
